ai-integration-story.text: Not Just a Wrapper. Here's what separates amateur AI work from professional: anyone can call the ChatGPT API. What makes a real AI integration is the architecture around it.
Prompt Engineering. Your prompts are code too. They need to be documented, tested, and iterated. A well-crafted prompt with structured output format is the foundation of reliable AI integration.
Output Validation. AI outputs are unpredictable. Professional integrations validate every response, handle malformed output gracefully, and never trust AI blindly.
System Integration. AI becomes powerful when it connects to real systems—GitHub for code review, databases for context, APIs for action. This is where the magic happens.
Production Ready. Caching, rate limiting, cost tracking, graceful degradation. These concerns separate demos from real products. Your capstone must address all of them.

prompt-story.text: Bad Prompts Fail. Review this code and find bugs. That's a bad prompt. It's vague, has no context, and produces inconsistent output you can't parse programmatically.
Set a Role. Start with: You are a senior Python developer performing a code review. This gives the AI context and expertise to draw from. Roles dramatically improve output quality.
Be Specific. List exactly what you want. Analyze for: security vulnerabilities, performance issues, style violations, missing error handling. Specificity gets specific results.
Structure Output. Request JSON with a defined schema. Severity, type, line number, description, suggestion. Now you can parse the output reliably in your code.
Test & Iterate. Version your prompts like code. Track what works and what doesn't. The best prompts evolve through iteration, not guesswork.

completion-story.text: Six Weeks Ago. Six weeks ago, you had a degree and some code. You could write programs but hadn't built systems. The gap between academia and industry felt vast.
What You've Built. Production data layer. Event-driven pipeline. API integration suite. System design portfolio. A deployed full-stack app. And now, an AI-augmented tool.
Interview Ready. The interview question isn't scary—you've designed systems bigger than what they'll ask. The job posting requirements aren't intimidating—you've built things that exceed them.
The Gap Is Closed. You're not just a CS student anymore. You're an engineer. They taught you to code. We taught you to build. Now go show them what you can do.
